input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product name information.

Product name:
Bernat Baby Coordinates Yarn - His Jeans

Product features:
Bernat Baby Co-Ordinates Yarn
For knit and crochet baby items
Easy care, wash and wear
Weight category: 3
Color: His Jeans
Solids: 75.2% acrylic, 22.2% rayon, 2.6% nylon
White & Ombres: 71.2% acrylic, 25.6% rayon, 3.2% nylon
Solids: 5 ounces (140 grams) 388 yards
White: 5 ounces (140 grams) 457 yards
Ombres: 4-1/4 ounces (120 grams) 392 yards
Gauge: lightweight #34"=22 stitches on size 6 needles
Not dye lotted
Machine wash and dry

Product description:
input_text.Response A: His Jeans from the Bernat Baby Co-Ordinates Yarn is a perfect choice for knit and crochet baby items. It is a lightweight yarn that is easy care, wash and wear. The yarn is made from 75.2% acrylic, 22.2% rayon, and 2.6% nylon. It is available in a variety of colors, including solids and ombres. The solids are 5 ounces (140 grams) and 388 yards, and the white is 5 ounces (140 grams) and 457 yards. The ombres are 4-1/4 ounces (120 grams) and 392 yards. The gauge is lightweight #34"=22 stitches on size 6 needles. This yarn is not dye lotted. Machine wash and dry.
input_text.Response B: Bernat Baby Coordinates Yarn is the perfect choice for knitting or crocheting baby items. Made with a blend of high-quality acrylic, rayon, and nylon fibers, the yarn is durable, easy to care for, and machine washable and dryable. Available in a variety of solid and ombres shades, it's easy to find the perfect color to match your project. The lightweight yarn is suitable for a wide range of projects, including hats, sweaters, blankets, and more. Whether you're creating an heirloom piece for a special baby or crafting a gift for a new mother, this versatile yarn is a great choice.
